events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking information hasn't been updated for several days.
The system has classified this issue as a Delivery Delay due to customer mentioning late shipment and tracking problems.
The case has been assigned to Delivery Support Team to investigate the delayed shipment.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the delay with your order. I will assist you in finding out what went wrong.
Could you please provide your order number and any tracking details you currently have so that I can look into the matter further?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the last tracking update shows that it was dispatched but hasn’t moved since then.
We have contacted the shipping carrier regarding your package. They expect an update within 48 hours and we will expedite the delivery once located.
Thanks for the update! I appreciate that you're following up and hope the delivery can be speeded up.
Your order has now been located and is out for delivery. We expect you to receive it today or tomorrow at the latest.
Just checking in to confirm that your delayed package arrived as expected. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since there have been no further concerns, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey regarding your experience with our delivery support team.
